meanings.definition: Not occurring or existing at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The nonsimultaneous arrival of the buses caused confusion at the station.
meanings.sent2: The nonsimultaneous meetings made it hard to coordinate everyone's schedules.
meanings.sent3: It was nonsimultaneous chaos when the music started playing at different speeds.
meanings.sent4: The nonsimultaneous growth of the plants in the garden created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent5: The nonsimultaneous ticking of the clocks echoed through the empty room.

meanings.definition: Not simultaneous; happening at different times.
meanings.sent1: The nonsimultaneous release of the movies allowed each to shine on its own.
meanings.sent2: The nonsimultaneous arrivals of the guests kept the party lively throughout the night.
meanings.sent3: The nonsimultaneous dance moves of the performers added an unexpected twist to the routine.
meanings.sent4: Their nonsimultaneous paths eventually led them to cross each other's lives.
meanings.sent5: The nonsimultaneous waves crashing against the shore created a mesmerizing rhythm.
